original_text: “You see the people crowding against you,” his disciples answered, “and yet you can ask, ‘Who touched me?’ ”
korean_text: 제자들이 여짜오되 무리가 에워싸 미는 것을 보시며 누가 내게 손을 대었느냐 물으시나이까 하되

sentences.original_text: "You see the people crowding against you,"

sentences.korean_translation: "그런데도 '나를 만진 사람이 누구냐'라고 물으실 수 있습니까?"
